attributes.action: Pay full wage instead of SSP during coranavirus outbreak
attributes.additional_details:
Guarantee full wage for workers .
So we do not lose money due to self isolation as SSP is not enough to live off.
When people on benefits are being guaranteed their full amount this is discrimination against workers.
attributes.background: The unemployed have been told they will get full payment of benefits during this coranavirus outbreak . Yet as a worker I and millions of other workers will lose over 3 quarters of wages if forced to go on SSP by self isolation our wages should be paid in full .
